# rmin  = 6.001 [GM/c2]
# rmax  = 2000.000 [GM/c2]
# lumi  = 9.09692e-02 [Ledd]
# mdot  = 1.00000e-01 [Mdot_Edd] (2.22548e+00 x 10^18 g/s)
#-------------------------------------------
# col1: radius [GM/c2]
# col2: flux (one side) [erg s-1 cm-2]
# col3: sigma [g cm-2]
# col4: specific angular momentum [none]
# col5: radial velocity [speed of light]
# col6: disk height [GM/c2]
# col7: disk slope (derivative dH/dR of height with respect to equatorial radius) [none]
